titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should not consider releasing Taliban prisoners, Abdul Haq Wasiq, Mullah Norullah Noori, Mullah Mohammed Fazl, and Mullah Khairullah Khairkhwa, from prison in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, until Mullah Muhammed Omar has been turned over to United States custody.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 1/25/2012--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that President Obama and the Department of State should not consider releasing Taliban prisoners Abdul Haq Wasiq, Mullah Norullah Noori, Mullah Mohammed Fazl, and Mullah Khairullah Khairkhwa from prison in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, until Mullah Muhammed Omar has been turned over to U.S. custody.
